paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In this study, six gene mutations previously classified as VUS were reclassified as likely pathogenic based on ClinVar review.

variants.evidence_level: strong evidence based on functional studies
variants.additional_notes: Reclassified based on sufficient evidence in functional studies.
key_quotes: BRCA2 c.8023A>G (p.Ile2675Val) was interpreted as pathogenic/likely pathogenic among variants in BRCA2 based on the ClinVar database.
